评论详情: My favorite sweatshirt!! So cute and cozy, great quality

So soft and comfortable! I got a medium and it fits great! Normally I wear a medium in Crz tops and a large in bottoms! Zipper is nice and quality is perfect for the price! It also has a secret phone pocket in the front pocket!!
I’m usually a Small to Medium and bought it in Medium. Love the fit but the sleeves are too long.
This is a nice sweatshirt option for the price. I love a quarter zip. This one is thick and comfy but they do seem to run a bit big.
so comfortable! and very good quality

评论概述: Very soft but too cropped and boxy
评论详情: Great material, very soft and warm but the cut just wasn't right. I felt it was too short on the torso and incredibly boxy so it didn't compliment my shape and I opted to return it.
The quality and fit is great and matches my set perfectly.
Loved the fabric and the fit. I ordered a Small to make sure it fit a bit more loose.

Sadly I’m just too cheap to buy brands like Lulu, but thankfully after finding this, I can keep being somewhat frugal AND fashionable lol. This looks just like the scuba pullover and fits really nicely as well. It’s thick but not suffocating, just feels well-made. The color was accurate to the pics and it’s very comfy with a good balance between stretch and structure. I ordered a size up originally (medium) but landed ultimately on my usual size (small) because it does fit oversized at base, which personally I love.
Cute and comfortable.  Kind of spendy for an Amazon sweatshirt but I decided to keep it.  Definitely could’ve sized down to an XS.
Amaing

评论概述: Great quality but Very Long Arms
评论详情: Loved the quality of the material and features. I ordered a small and the body fit great, a bit oversized as described in the description, but I wasn't swimming in it.  The arms are another story.  Long arms with too much material around the shoulders.  Love the color selections offered, but I would not order this sweatshirt again, as it's a workout just trying to keep my shoulders back with the weight of the excess material.

评论概述: Great dupe! Extra long sleeves though
评论详情: This is a fantastic sweatshirt. I got the creamy white color and it’s a great winter white. It’s very well made and much of the special seams and details are very close to lulu. I also think this is the same, or as close as possible, fabric that the scuba line is made of.  Only minor complaint is that these sleeves are longer than expected.  I like an oversized look so I ordered the large. Next one will be a medium for sure.  Washes well. Don’t skip on this one!

This jacket is the same color as pictured! I have the one with the hood and now this one without the hood. I love both of them! This is an oversized crop sweatshirt. I love the way it stops right above my hips but is wide at my hips. I wear this jacket to work, workouts, and just running errands. It is soft and so comfortable! It does not shrink when you wash it. The thumb holes fit great! One thing that is so great about this sweatshirt is the mesh pocket inside the center pocket. It is great for holding my AirPods securely. I have recommended this sweatshirt to all my friends.

I liked the cut/look of this pull over, but just didn't think it was $50 worth. Not a fan of the color selection either. I originally ordered “ink blue” which appeared to be a nice gemstone blue/teal tone in the photo. What I got was navy blue, boring. I have ordered from this company previously, and I’ve been fooled by the advertised colors before versus what you actually get, annoying to say the least. I then ordered sage green, it was just okay looking. Also beware this is very much over sized. I sized down to an XS and it fit right. My regular size small would’ve been huge. I just didnt love it enough to keep it for that price, returned.

Super soft. Super cute. But ENORMOUS! Def size down. I bought a small which is my typical size in tops. I really think I could possibly go two sizes down to the XXS. Even if you like your sweatshirts baggy, you can still size down.
I loved this sweatshirt and it fits great. After several washes in cold and hung to dry it is starting to fade. I would re-order in a lighter color.

评论概述: Lulu quality at half the price
评论详情: This sweatshirt is warm, cozy and well-made.  It seemed spendy for an Amazon sweatshirt, but it is worth the price!
Really disappointed with the quality of this item! While it was similar to lulu, the quality was not there. After one wash I could not wear again due to a grungy look 🙁

I was drawn to this because some people claim it’s a Lululemon dupe for the Scuba Oversized Half Zip. The material is much thinner than Lulu and the shape & size is quite different. I ordered a Small and it looks way too big on me - especially in the arms. I’m 5’4”, 125lbs. In comparison, I’ve pictured the top underneath my LuluLemon Scuba Oversized Half Zip(xs/small).  Without comparison, it is a nice quality sweatshirt, the color is great and it is cute. If you’re on the smaller size, definitely go down in the size you order.
Love this sweatshirt!  Great quality and fit as expected.  Only issue is sleeves are very long but I can easily roll them up, hence the 4 not 5 stars.
Very soft, great oversized fit. Very cropped
Great fit, true to size, super soft, comfortable, thick zipper, light weight
Wrong for, not best material

On me (5'6", size Medium, long torso), this was cropped with very long, very wide arms. Like Popeye arms. Not a flattering fit. I love this brand's leggings and always find them true to size, but this hoodie didn't work for me at all.

评论概述: Very cute, nice quality but BIG
评论详情: This sweatshirt as really nice, very comfy, warm enough for chilly winter in the south and very soft, however it is definitely oversized and the sleeves are definitely a bit long. If you want something that’s not completely hanging loose on your body I recommend sizing down one size at least. I ordered a medium since losing some weight and it’s huge. Will be exchanging for a smaller size.
I really like these sweatshirts and have two that are great. However, this round the produced was used, no tags and a broken zipper. I do not like having my time wasted anymore than anyone else !
Bought this for a gift exchange. Everyone thought it was a Lulu scuba - this is such a high quality sweatshirt and for the price you can buy multiple!

I love it! Very well made oversized look sweatshirt. The fleece is really so soft, warm and comfortable to the skin! Please consider to make more colors! Very versatile, I can see myself dress up and down in this. It is also comparable to the well known brand as well!

评论概述: Great product but pants took too long to ship!
评论详情: Love the quality and fit! True to size. The pants shipped separately and are taking about 2 weeks to arrive! Taking too long to arrive and will not be able to wear on my trip.
Wasn’t sure about this, but I am in love! I am buying it different colors!
The quality is very similar to Lulu. I ended up returning my usual size because it was too large.
I get complimented every time I wear these. SO comfy and great quality.
This is high quality, love it! Perfect lululemon scuba dupe….my daughter likes it a lot! I love CRZ
This sweatshirt is a perfect lulu dupe, and so very soft! Great value!
I have this sweatshirt in multiple colors. It's adorable and the colors and style are so cute. Very comparable to lululemon.
True to size. Great lulu dupe for the money.
This turned out great! The material is great and is great quality!
so so good. fir color and material is perfect
This is just beautiful, so soft and comfy. I would size down if you don’t want it to be that over sized look.
Ran a little big in the arms for me. This would be great in cold weather. Too warm for the south.
I love this thing, it’s so fanionable but also keeps you warm. Very good quality and the material is pretty thick.
Very comfortable and durable!
I sized down and still has a good oversized fir
Very boxy and stiff no soft stretch. Pretty color though, I ordered an xl and it didn’t sit well on my body unfortunately

Poor quality once washed a handful of times. Initially I thought I loved this jacket. Then the structure gets ruined and the fabric pills terribly. Wish I could get my money back  since it’s unwearable now :(

I have the real lululemon scuba and although they claim a similar fabric composition, it is not. I’ve had my Lulu one for almost 6 months and the fabric has withheld the test of time. I’ve had the CZR yoga one for 2 weeks and it’s pilling badly. Do not recommend spend the extra money and get the real one.
I was really excited about this since I love all things CRZ but this was very very large and boxy. Can’t recommend but the fabric felt amazing
Great lulu dupe. Very soft and comfortable.

Very nice Lulu dupe. Love the softness and coziness, love the style, love the large selection of colors, but the sleeves are way too long. Fits TTS everywhere else but the sleeves extend way past my hands. I think it's a hassle to keep rolling up the sleeves or fold them up, making them unworkable for me, so I'm returning. Very disappointed.
Super cute but received 2 sweaters that seem used. For the price I was hoping for better quality.
Loved loved this until I washed it. Washed cold and dried tumble low. Was a great dupe and super comfy but now looks silly
Love the color and item overall, but appeared used. There were different kinds of stains. Hoping to be able to order the same product in a new condition

I sized up because many people said it shrunk. Glad I ordered a size up. Would recommend. I needed the length. Did shrink some … Some said the color faded. I did not find that I have washed a few times. I bought the pink. I would recommend and I did order another color. Reminds me of lulu. Cropped but good fit. Stylish. I love this company. I also have several leggings.
This top is very boxy and wide, I wish I would have sized down, after one wash the length has shrunk a lot so it’s very cropped but still way too wide and not flattering at all.
10/10 recommend! Everything about this sweat shirt is perfect! I’m wearing a size medium but you can size down because it is very oversized!
Runs huge and pilled after one wash!!!
I love this it’s so cute and warm!

评论用户: Biene de buena calidad pero esta la talla muy grande pedí talla s y me quedó enorme enorme
评论详情: Está muy amplia es de buena calidad pero la talla es enorme
Very soft and sturdy. Nice long sleeves. I did size down, ordered a large first and it was way to big. But super happy with my medium (I am 1,76cm and 75kg)
Big in shoulders which wasn’t the look I was going for and zipper was a little sticky so I returned

I got size 10 and as it is an oversized fit, it’s super comfy and stylish. The fabric is very soft, really good quality and the top keeps me warm. Lovely colour too! So far this is better than Lululemon by price and make. No criticism at all and now I want them in all colours. Shame they are all out of stock!

Absolutely love this, amazing quality, I am 5ft 8 and size 8 got the size 10 and fits so comfy and slightly oversized but with a slight crop. The arms are perfect length for me and the thumb holes are perfect touch!

Super stylish und auch tolle Verarbeitung. Leider ist es bei der ersten Wäsche, obwohl ich mich an alle Angaben gehalten habe, eingelaufen und ist jetzt an den Armen zu kurz. Ich trage es trotzdem, aber es ist einfach nicht mehr so kuschelig wie vorher.
Live this top! True to size, good quality material

This is a nice cropped 3-quarter pull over but it’s not hooded and is not scuba at all. The material is more like a thick cotton. The thumb holes are good addition. Thankfully I didn’t pay full price as I don’t think it’s worth that. I would have sent it back if I had.
After following the washing instructions the jumper came out ruined after one wash. The material is now all bobbly and shaggy looking. Waiting on a reply from customer care.
